ResearchProjectDef.label: antidepressant production
ResearchProjectDef.description: Produce antidepressant, a mildly euphoric drug which is used to counteract depression.

ResearchProjectDef.label: painkiller production
ResearchProjectDef.description: Produce painkiller, an analgesic drug which provides a relief from pain. Useful for pawns who have painful scars.

ResearchProjectDef.label: scythe production
ResearchProjectDef.description: Produce scythe, an immunostimulant drug which drastically boosts the user's immune system at the cost of inducing a temporary coma.

ResearchProjectDef.label: overclock production
ResearchProjectDef.description: Produce overclock, a self-injected drug cocktail which boosts the metabolism into overdrive, augmenting movement and productivity while wearing down the body's energy reserves.

ResearchProjectDef.label: ectostasis production
ResearchProjectDef.description: Produce ectostasis, a homeostatic drug which uses mechanites to provide relief from internal conditions.

ResearchProjectDef.label: sorrow production
ResearchProjectDef.description: Produce sorrow, a depressant drug which is used to induce a state of cathartic sadness.

ResearchProjectDef.label: fibrodust production
ResearchProjectDef.description: Produce fibrodust, a coagulant drug which staunches bleeding temporarily, but may cause cardiovascular issues.

ResearchProjectDef.label: neoderm production
ResearchProjectDef.description: Produce neoderm, a regenerative ointment which painfully heals dermal scars over time.
